message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 no such column: posts.post_status.
details:
[08-May-2025 23:29:15 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

SELECT comments.comment_ID FROM wp_comments AS comments LEFT JOIN wp_commentmeta AS commentmeta ON (comments.comment_ID = commentmeta.comment_id) LEFT JOIN wp_posts AS post ON (posts.ID=comments.comment_post_ID) WHERE comments.comment_approved = 1 AND comments.comment_type != 'pingback' AND (commentmeta.meta_key != 'nnx' OR commentmeta.meta_id IS NULL) AND posts.post_status = 'publish' ORDER BY comments.comment_ID DESC LIMIT 1

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: SELECT comments.comment_ID FROM wp_comments AS comments LEFT JOIN wp_commentmeta AS commentmeta ON (comments.comment_ID = commentmeta.comment_id) LEFT JOIN wp_posts AS post ON (posts.ID=comments.comment_post_ID) WHERE comments.comment_approved = 1 AND comments.comment_type != :param0 AND (commentmeta.meta_key != :param1 OR commentmeta.meta_id IS NULL) AND posts.post_status = :param2 ORDER BY comments.comment_ID DESC LIMIT 1 | parameters: pingback, nnx, publish
  3. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
Error occurred at line 4117 in Function handle_error. Error message was: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 no such column: posts.post_status.
